author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...GABRIELLE ACCELERATES EASTWARD ACROSS THE SUBTROPICAL ATLANTIC... ...EXPECTED TO BRING HURRICANE CONDITIONS WHEN IT PASSES NEAR OR OVER THE AZORES LATE THURSDAY OR EARLY FRIDAY...
summary: ...GABRIELLE ACCELERATES EASTWARD ACROSS THE SUBTROPICAL ATLANTIC... ...EXPECTED TO BRING HURRICANE CONDITIONS WHEN IT PASSES NEAR OR OVER THE AZORES LATE THURSDAY OR EARLY FRIDAY... As of 2:00 PM AST Wed Sep 24 the center of Gabrielle was located near 36.1, -46.8 with movement E at 26 mph. The minimum central pressure was 962 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 110 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...GABRIELLE ACCELERATES EASTWARD ACROSS THE SUBTROPICAL ATLANTIC... ...EXPECTED TO BRING HURRICANE CONDITIONS WHEN IT PASSES NEAR OR OVER THE AZORES LATE THURSDAY OR EARLY FRIDAY... As of 2:00 PM AST Wed Sep 24 the center of Gabrielle was located near 36.1, -46.8 with movement E at 26 mph. The minimum central pressure was 962 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 110 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Gabrielle (AT2/AL072025)
